item.title: Measuring and Modeling Foster Kitten Growth: R Stats with Cats
item.description: Data Updated 2019-07-05 My partner brought home a box of three week old kittens that had been brought to her work. The man who found them said that during a heavy rainstorm heard tiny meows in his yard and then saw a little kitten face scrambling to get out of a depression. He went to rescue the baby kitten and found FIVE kittens, most of them were totally submerged in rising water.
